ygData.messageBody:
Joseph,

I'm really shocked that people in the zone were so mean, and I am even
more shocked that the GMs weren't helpful.

I've addressed homophobic remarks in OOC before usually with the result
being silence from everyone else in the zone, and occasionally with a
"yeah grow up" comment thrown in by someone. Usually (not always) it
serves to shut the person up. I haven't ever told anyone in game that I'm
bi, I just don't find EQ an environment I've been comfortable doing that
in.

I'm really saddened by your situaton, and I think it deserves more
attention from Verant. Perhaps you could follow up on this more directly,
by phoning or emailing them? The important thing really is that you do
what feels best for you (whether that's letting the situation drop, or
taking it further). Verant said no anti-gay harassment in their usage
policy, and they'd better live up to that!

- Christina
